name: Safuchain
description:
Same blockchain, more safety.
Uniswap: September 21, 5pm UTC, 2022

Whitepaper: https://safuchain.net/SafuchainLitepaperV2.pdf

Safe protocols built into chain, to protect investors from common day skems, and raccoon bottom feeder devs alike. DAO controls the level of centralization Safuchain holds. 

Safuchain is built upon the Polygon network as a layer 2 for Ethereum. Ran as a Polygon EVM - Ethereum Virtual Machine. ERC20, ERC721, Staking, Yield Farming, Gaming, Defi with 1000x Faster Speed, 100th the Transaction Fees, and safety built in!  

Safuchain is built with three key principles in mind: 

1. Safety 
2. Ease-Of-Access
3. Retention of Investors 

Governance is live on September 20th, 2022, once you claim tokens from Juicebox, head on over to  guild.xyz/SafuChain to join your new community.
